basics.name: Kina Kim
basics.Title: Developer
basics.summary: Software Engineer who loves being the bridge between Tech and Society

work.name: International Business Machine
work.summary: As a Software Engineer on the Db2 on Cloud team, I led the development and maintenance of cloud pipelines to ensure seamless and efficient software operations. I worked on enhancing system reliability using Machine Learning to analyze and resolve anomalies in Db2 commands, improving the overall stability of the system.
highlights: Led the development of cloud pipelines to reduce failure and manual intervention
Enhanced system reliability using Machine Learning for anomaly detection in Db2 commands
Ensured stable cloud operations and better customer experiences

work.name: Royal Bank of Canada
work.summary: During my internship at RBC, I led a Machine Learning project aimed at predicting customer churn. I developed strategies to identify trends and presented a prototype model for churn prediction, which was successfully integrated into the company's business operations. I also performed data processing and analysis using Hadoop and SQL to extract insights.
highlights: Scoped and led a high-impact ML project focused on predicting customer churn
Utilized Hadoop and SQL for ETL processes and large dataset analysis
Developed and presented a predictive churn model to enhance customer retention
Collaborated with IT and Product teams for seamless integration of data insights

work.name: International Business Machine
work.summary: As a Software Engineer focusing on testing and causal analysis, I contributed to the design of large-scale database systems and optimized system reliability. My role included developing automated testing pipelines, implementing anomaly detection systems, and training Machine Learning models to enhance database performance.
highlights: Developed automated testing pipelines using Bash scripting, reducing manual testing
Analyzed and maintained IBM’s pureScale Db2 database to prioritize system availability
Trained GAN models to generate efficient syntax-aware database queries
Designed an anomaly detection system to proactively identify irregularities

Papers.name: Zur Elektrody/namik bewegter Körper
Papers.summary: It concerned an interpretation of the Michelson–Morley experiment and the properties of light and time. Special relativity incorporates the principle that the speed of light is the same for all inertial observers regardless of the state of motion of the source.

Papers.name: Die Grundlage der allgemeinen Relativitätstheorie
Papers.summary: The publication of the theory of general relativity made him internationally famous. He was professor of physics at the universities of Zurich (1909–1911) and Prague (1911–1912), before he returned to ETH Zurich (1912–1914).
